Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: The star rating and old reviews make this place somewhere that you could pass by, but honestly do not walk by. Go in and have a chat with super friendly staff, have some amazing tasting and looking forward and a genuinely lovely experience.

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Best waffles in dam! Really nice staff, and good coffee

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Two friendly guys run this place. Upstairs is cosy and welcoming with nice music (unlike some places we've been this weekend where they insist on techno blasting out). Pancakes are delicious and worth seeking out. On a little back road and not heaving with people. Recommend.

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text:

How surprised I was when my plate comes: one single cr√™pe with Nutella and some icing sugar. And I payed 8,50‚Ç¨ for it. Totally not worth it. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Great Dutch pancakes, cost place, affordable prices, nice music (they're not techno-blasting you into oblivion) and the lad making the pancakes is quite chill ! I recommend.

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Worst! 8,50 for a Pancake served like this and unfriendly staff!

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Amazing food, atmosphere AND staff!! We just had to come back for a second round (even at the same day) üòä

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Good friendly service. Melvin working there made me feel welcome!

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Lovely small place with cosy seating upstairs. Great pancakes and service.

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Tastiest food, will definitely go back on my next trip to Amsterdam

Name: De Pannenkoekerij
Review Text: Rude, poor quality food. Why are they still open?
